title: How to Get Rock Smash in Pokémon Ruby

steps.title: Go to Mauville City.
steps.content: Go to Mauville City. Enter the city via Route 110. Mauville City is a multi-layered city with a bike shop, gym, slot machines, and more.

steps.title: Find the gray house on the right of the Poké Mart.
steps.content: Find the gray house on the right of the Poké Mart. Head north from Route 110, to the center of town. The Pokémart is to your right. Walk past the mart and enter the gray house. You can pick up an X Speed along the way. Check behind the map near the bike racks on the south side of the city. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the gray house and talk to the man at the table inside.
steps.content: Enter the gray house and talk to the man at the table inside. He is scientist who calls himself "Rock Smash Dude." He will give you HM Rock Smash.

steps.title: Go to the Mauville Gym and battle Wally.
steps.content: Go to the Mauville Gym and battle Wally. He is blocking the entrance to the gym and you must battle him to enter. Luckily, Wally is rather weak, with only one Level 16 Pokémon. [2] X Research source Once you beat Wally, he will run away and allow you to access the gym.

steps.title: Battle Watson, the gym leader.
steps.content: Battle Watson, the gym leader. This is an electric gym, so you will need some anti-electric Pokémon to succeed. [3] X Research source Watson is hidden behind electrified walls, but you can easily move these out of your way by stepping on the lightening bolts. The walls will reposition so you can walk through. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Obtain the Dynamo Badge.
steps.content: Obtain the Dynamo Badge. Watson will award you with the Dynamo Badge and TM - 34 Shock Wave once he is defeated. The badge will allow you to use Rock Smash outside of battle, so you can access areas that are blocked by rocks.

steps.title: Visit the Mauville Gym.
steps.content: Visit the Mauville Gym. The gym is located on the upper left side of the city, near Route 111. Wally and his uncle will be standing outside. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Battle Wally.
steps.content: Battle Wally. The youngster will challenge you to a short, easy Pokémon battle against Ralts. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Obtain Rock Smash.
steps.content: Obtain Rock Smash. Once you defeat Wally, he will decide to return to Verdanturf. His uncle will reward you with HM06 Rock Smash, as you have been a positive influence on his nephew. [7] X Research source
